name: Grounded (itch) (Leon Stansfield)
description:
Fight your way from the confines of the planet in this fast-paced bullet hell shooter!

This game was made in 6 days for the bullet hell jam 2022.

Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse to aim

Left-click to shoot.

All feedback and ratings are greatly appreciated!

Please let me know of any bugs you may experience.
